definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: If all the IZs in the province were filled up, environment pollution would be a great deal more serious.
sentences.chinese: 如果省內的工業區全部投產，環境污染將更加嚴重。

sentences.english: The plan to phase down environmental pollution is progressing successfully.
sentences.chinese: 逐步減少環境污染的計劃正在順利進行。

sentences.english: It is of reference value to control the pollution of the regional environment.
sentences.chinese: 這對於改善區域環境污染有一定參考意義。

sentences.english: Bedsides, the use of chemical substances in agriculture also causes environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在農業中使用化學物品也造成了環境污染。

sentences.english: They must say ‘no’ to projects that can cause environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 他們必須要對導致環境污染的項目說“不”。

sentences.english: The direct drainage of bottom pot water would induce seriously environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 鍋底水的直接排放會引起嚴重的環境污染。

sentences.english: Help cut down on environmental waste in whatever way you can
sentences.chinese: 減少環境污染，力所能及，從我做起。

sentences.english: In fact, winter indoor environmental pollution hazard greater than the summer.
sentences.chinese: 其實，冬季室內環境污染的危害比夏季更大。

sentences.english: To analyze the relationship between reproduction-endocrine organ-related tumors and environmental pollution in China.
sentences.chinese: 分析我國生殖內分泌腫瘤與環境污染的關係。

sentences.english: Thirdly, there is no unified standard of environmental damage compensation.
sentences.chinese: 三是缺乏統一的環境污染損害賠償標準。

sentences.english: Reuse of waste material, material regeneration and reduction or elimination of enviromental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 廢物深加工，再生資源化，減少或消除環境污染。

sentences.english: For instance, environmental pollution has caused the sperm decrease of males.
sentences.chinese: 如環境污染使男人精子減少。

sentences.english: The environmental pollution makes the world become warmer than before.
sentences.chinese: 環境污染使地球變得比以前暖和。

sentences.english: This text researches the generalized environment of the pollution of the country.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的是廣義上的農村環境污染。

sentences.english: The rate of industrial development is directly proportional to the degree of environmental pollution.
sentences.chinese: 展速度與環境污染的程度是成正比的。

sentences.english: Our head-teacher said , in order to prevent environmental pollution, we shouldn't dump garbage on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 校長說，爲防止環境污染，我們不應該向草坪上亂倒。

definition: environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
